field.label: Show Add To Cart Button
field.comment:
If enabled, the Add To Cart button is displayed for every product in the Klevu Search results.
If you are using JSv2 JS Theme, this option will determine whether an "add to cart" function is added to your frontend, which will be triggered when add to cart is clicked. To control whether or not "add to cart button" itself should appear, please log in to the Klevu Merchant Centre.
